node.display_long_description:
Step into wonderful, immersive VR stories, hand painted and animated in VR with Quill. These VR stories not only let you view a painting on a wall, but transport you into the painting itself. Experience expressive characters, fantastic creatures, and complete narratives in these VR animations. . 

Regularly updated, the Quill Theater lets you visit high quality immersive  animations from the comfort of Oculus TV, bringing you the best in immersive entertainment. 

These immersive animations are fully 6DOF, some including multiple viewpoints to let your move positionally within the art, and the ability for you to both “Pause” the story to take in every brush stroke, and “Start” to bring the story back to life! 

To create your own VR stories, test your hand in the VR illustration and animation tool, Quill, available on the Rift platform. https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1118609381580656/

Requires the latest version of Oculus TV.
node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription:
Plot: a girl is excited about her first trip to the jungle she went with her parents but she got lost she went past so many dangers quicksand snakes mosquitoes tigers and spider webs then she saw a little house house she knock on the door an old man answered he was friendly she welcomed to stay the night here she told the man about getting lost he decided to help her 

The next morning they set out to find the girls parents they took a boat and went over a waterfall
There they saw 2 elephants and ride on them some how they can talk and they said they saw two people the girl knew they meant her parents so they riddin them but they ran into a lion luckily with their big feet the elephants took down the lion so they continued then they found a mud pit then the elephants started playing in the mud pit and the girl joined in and so did the man soon they began to get tired and continued then they saw a lake and they washed the mud away and then they continued then they saw smoke they knew someone was camping so they carried on

When they get there they see 2 locals they said the girls parents went ⬅️this way so the locals climbed on the elephants the. They see more smoke and they knew that someone was camping they saw it was the girls parents they were delighted to see there girl they thanked the man the elephants and the locals then they went home 

THE END
node.reviewTitle: Idea for a jungle adventure story
